Resources

Your first stop for any help related to computing with data should be the book: Getting used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown.

R

  • Datacamp: Intro to R Course: online platform for learning the nuts and bolts of R.
  • swirl: Learn R, in R: an altervative interactive platform for learning R.
  • Cookbook for R: more advanced, once youâ€™ve got your feet wet.
